Package Main

Class GameBoardRenderer

java.lang.Object
Main.GameBoardRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderer
public class GameBoardRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderer
Public class GameBoardRenderer is the View of the MVC design pattern and is responsible for rendering all the graphics in the game. The renderer renders everything from the bricks, ball and player to the game messages and the pause menu.
Since:
28/11/2021
Version:
1.0
Author:
TanZhunXian

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.awt.Dimension area
    Dimensions of the game screen to draw the pause menu options.
    private static java.awt.Color BG_COLOR
    White colour to clear the background.
    private static java.lang.String CONTINUE
    Continue string.
    private static java.lang.String EXIT
    Exit string.
    private GameBoard gameBoard
    GameBoard to get all information needed to draw the ball, bricks, player and game messages.
    private static java.awt.Color MENU_COLOR
    Menu words colour of green.

    Font for pause menu words.

    Image for Game background.

    Pause Menu String

    Restart string
    private int strLen
    Integer to record length of string "Pause Menu" to center the pause menu title.
    private static int TEXT_SIZE
    Text size of 30.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    GameBoardRenderer​(GameBoard gameBoard, java.awt.Dimension area)
    This constructor loads in the GameBoard so that renderer can get all information for rendering and the screen dimensions to draw the pause menu.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void clear​(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
    This method is used to clear the background by filling it with white colour.
    private void drawBall​(Ball ball, java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
    This method is used to draw the ball by filling inner colour and drawing outer colour.
    private void drawBrick​(Brick brick, java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
    This method is used to draw the bricks by filling inner colour and drawing outer colour.
    private void drawMenu​(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
    This method is used to draw the pause menu.
    private void drawMessages​(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
    This method is used to draw the game messages to show game condition such as number of bricks and balls left and game focus.
    private void drawPauseMenu​(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
    This method is used to draw the strings and buttons of the pause menu.
    private void drawPlayer​(Player p, java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
    This method is used to draw the player by filling inner colour and drawing outer colour.
    private void drawPowerUp​(GodModePowerUp powerUp, java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
    This method is used to draw a red circle power up which triggers God mode for the player for 10 seconds when collected.
    private void obscureGameBoard​(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
    This method is used to add black composite to the pause menu.
    void render​(java.awt.Graphics g)
    This method is used to render the graphics for the entire game screen.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • GameBoardRenderer

      public GameBoardRenderer​(GameBoard gameBoard, java.awt.Dimension area) throws java.io.IOException
      This constructor loads in the GameBoard so that renderer can get all information for rendering and the screen dimensions to draw the pause menu.
      Parameters:
      gameBoard - GameBoard to get all information needed to draw the ball, bricks, player and game messages.
      area - Dimensions of the game screen to draw the pause menu options.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - This constructor throws IOException if game background image is not found.

  • Method Details

    • render

      public void render​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      This method is used to render the graphics for the entire game screen. The game screen is first cleared with a white background. Then, a gray background is loaded. The game condition, score and time strings are drawn in blue and then the ball, bricks, player and power up are drawn. Finally, if the pause menu is loaded,the pause menu is drawn with its buttons.
      Specified by:
      render in interface Renderer
      Parameters:
      g - This parameter is used to control the graphics such as colour, composite and font.

    • clear

      private void clear​(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
      This method is used to clear the background by filling it with white colour.
      Parameters:
      g2d - This parameter is used to control the graphics such as colour.

    • drawBrick

      private void drawBrick​(Brick brick, java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
      This method is used to draw the bricks by filling inner colour and drawing outer colour.
      Parameters:
      brick - This parameter tells the method what colour to use for the bricks.
      g2d - This parameter is used to control the graphics such as colour.

    • drawBall

      private void drawBall​(Ball ball, java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
      This method is used to draw the ball by filling inner colour and drawing outer colour.
      Parameters:
      ball - This parameter tells the method what colour to use for the ball.
      g2d - This parameter is used to control the graphics such as colour.

      private void drawPlayer​(Player p, java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)

      p - This parameter tells the method what colour to use for the player.
      g2d - This parameter is used to control the graphics such as colour.

    • drawMessages

      private void drawMessages​(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
      This method is used to draw the game messages to show game condition such as number of bricks and balls left and game focus.
      Parameters:
      g2d - This parameter is used to control the colour and font of the game messages.

    • drawPowerUp

      private void drawPowerUp​(GodModePowerUp powerUp, java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
      This method is used to draw a red circle power up which triggers God mode for the player for 10 seconds when collected.
      Parameters:
      powerUp - This parameter tells the method what colour to use for the power up.
      g2d - This parameter is used to control the graphics such as colour.

    • drawMenu

      private void drawMenu​(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
      This method is used to draw the pause menu.
      Parameters:
      g2d - This parameter is used to control the graphics such as colour, composite and font.
